attributes.action: Reduce the amount of  immigrants in england
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it clearly states when seeking asylum you are supposed to flee to the nearest country. so why do so many immigrants choose to travel half way around the world to come to england? the answer is simple.. they receive all sorts of finance and payments over here which is why they come. the solution is also simple.. do not support the immigrants in any way financially for 5 years until they have proven they are willing to serve the state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
